rows.label: qst711502_msg0003
rows.name:
With this, I can proceed with my
research on ether miasma. Yes.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0004
rows.name:
In my opinion, ether miasma is
likely a type of waste product
discharged from the Divine Beast...

rows.label: qst711502_msg0005
rows.name:
And as you all know, Divine Beasts
are life forms that use ether as
their main energy source.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0006
rows.name:
If the flow of ether normalizes, the Divine
Beast's metabolism will improve, and the miasma,
which is a waste product, will dissipate.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0007
rows.name: But, this is still just my hypothesis.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0009
rows.name:
What?! There is someone
among you who can manipulate
the flow of ether?!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0010
rows.name:
And you can eliminate
the ether miasma?!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0011
rows.name: Wh-what is this... It can't be...

rows.label: qst711502_msg0012
rows.name:
No... It means my hypothesis
was correct, right? Yes!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0013
rows.name: From now on, I'll be busy proving it.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0014
rows.name:
Well then, everyone, thank you
for your cooperation! Yes!

rows.label: qst711502_msg0101
rows.name:
I'd like you to defeat a monster
called the Espina Feris.

rows.label: qst711502_msg0102
rows.name:
If you do, I can immerse myself in
my research on ether miasma. Yes.
